title: Refund skins on banned account? If not, isn't that stealing on Riot's part?
body:
If you pay hundreds of dollars for skins, then have your account permanently banned, isn't that theft on Riot's part? You pay for a product, then they take it back from you. Bait and switch? I think so. This crap has got to stop.

I've literally paid over 500 dollars for skins, then I get permabanned because trolls can't handle criticism and they gang up for reports. I've even got a chat restriction before simply for choosing teemo top lane. They hate teemo, they report me. I get banned. Then more bans leads to permanent ban and...I'm defrauded from WHAT I PURCHASED. 

Riot needs to fix this or get sued.
